\begin{tikzcd}
                 & \mathcal{A}_{0} & c \in \mathcal{A}_{0}      & c' \in \mathcal{A}_{0}       &                        &  &  & {\mathrm{Set} \times \mathrm{Hom}_{\Bbbk}(\mathcal{A},\Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat})_{0} \\ (\mathbf{I}, \{ F_{i} \}_{i\in I})}   &  & {\mathrm{Hom}_{\Bbbk}(\mathcal{A},\Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat})}                            &  & \mathrm{Set} \\
i = 1            &                 & F_{1} c                    & F_{1} c'                     & F_{1}                  &  &  & {\mathrm{Set} \times \mathrm{Hom}_{\Bbbk}(\mathcal{A},\Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat})_{1} \\ (\mathbf{I}, \{ \pi_{i} \}_{i\in I})} &  & \Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat}                                                                &  &              \\
i = 2            &                 & F_{2} c                    & F_{2} c'                     & F_{2}                  &  &  & {\mathrm{Set} \times \Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat}_{0} \\ (\mathbf{I}, \{ A_{i} \}_{i\in I})}                                     &  & {\mathrm{Set}\times \Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat}_{1} \\ (\mathbf{I}, \{ p_{i} \}_{i\in I})} &  &              \\
\oplus_{i=1}^{2} &                 & (F_{1} c) \oplus (F_{2} c) & (F_{1} c') \oplus (F_{2} c') & (F_{1}) \oplus (F_{2}) &  &  & {\mathrm{Hom}_{\Bbbk}(\mathcal{A},\Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat})_{0} \\ \oplus_{i\in I} F_{i}}                                    &  & \Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat}_{1} \\ p_{i} : A \rightarrow A_{i}                             &  &              \\
\oplus_{i=1}^{2} &                 & (F_{1} \oplus F_{2}) c     & (F_{1} \oplus F_{2}) c'      & F_{1} \oplus F_{2}     &  &  & \Bbbk\text{-}\mathrm{mat}_{0} \\ A = \oplus_{i \in I} A_{i}                                                                   &  &                                                                                          &  &             
\end{tikzcd}
